summary: Summon a menacing fork to your finger tips and strike fear into the hearts of men.
descriptionHtml:
The spell you\'ve all been waiting for!!! 
Now you can summon a fork at your fingertips to slay your enemies!
But this fork is not like any normal fork.
It is fueled by magic and is more powerful (but not overpowering). 
The spell tome is located in the Arch-Mage\'s quarters in the College of Winterhold. 
Have fun killing your enemies with this magical fork. 
Don\'t forget to endorse, comment, and share it with your friends!

Please don\'t ask questions I have already covered in screenshots or the description. If you do ask a question i have covered, I will simply tell you to look again.
author: Dovahcake or Krit Rawkets on Steam
